basics.name: Justin Smith
basics.label: Senior Data Engineer
basics.summary:
Versatile engineer specializing in scalable, data-intensive systems and high-performance applications. Proficient in modern frameworks and technologies, including but not limited to AWS, Kafka, React, Docker, PostgreSQL/TimescaleDB, and Jenkins. Demonstrates a proven track record in creating robust data pipelines, real-time event processing systems, and event-driven orchestration with pub/sub architectures, delivering scalable solutions with exceptional performance, reliability, and maintainability.

Adaptable and ambitious, leveraging a diverse background in software and data engineering to tackle complex challenges, mitigate risks, and deliver impactful results. Skilled at aligning engineering solutions with business goals while fostering collaboration and knowledge-sharing to drive team success. Holds Secret PCL-Level Clearance, ensuring trust and reliability in sensitive environments.

**Areas of Expertise**

Scalable Architecture Design, Data Engineering, Full-Stack Development, Distributed Systems, Cross-functional Team Collaboration, Real-Time Data Processing, Event-Driven Orchestration, Cloud and Containerization, Data Modeling, Software Design Patterns, Performance Optimization, Agile Development, DevOps, Software Development Lifecycle (SDL)

references.name: Alexander Hines
references.reference: Justin's adaptability and quick uptake of new tools and technologies played a critical role in our team's success. He identified Apache Kafka as the most suitable data engineering tool for extracting, replicating, and transforming data from proprietary systems. His design and implementation of the backend integrated data platform has been a stable and reliable solution for our clients, laying a solid foundation for the future of Data Engineering at Camgian.

references.name: Camgian - Internal Recognition
references.reference: When our client's servers went down during the CrowdStrike outage, and we stopped receiving live data, Justin was quick to identify the root cause, reach out to the customer to confirm, and was quick to resolve the issue once the client's servers were back online. Justin set and met the goal of monitoring and responding to any issues with the production system, didn't tolerate any problems once an issue arose, quickly diagnosed the root cause, identified an effective solution, and pushed through to completion, ensuring that the product displayed accurate and up-to-date information. This award symbolizes excellence at Camgian and exemplify the drive, determination, and dedication to achieving elite performer status per our Principles.
